eksia software
eksia offers consulting and custom software development services on the node.js and .NET stacks.

WHY EKSIA?

We are a software development company that specialises in building custom web-based, mobile (React native) and desktop applications, and in providing consultancy services to organisations seeking on demand colaboration.


Custom Software

We combine technical know how, a deep understanding of our clients’ business goals and agile development practices to deliver custom software products.

App Design / UX

There's more to software than just functionality. From branding and design, all the way to user experience, these aspects are an integral part of building software users will want to continue using.

DevOps

The application lifecycle doesn't stop after development finishes. We provide deployment, infrastructure maintenance and monitoring services on demand.
